name: Ninja Gaiden Stage Remake
description:
Ninja Gaiden Stage Remake is the first installment of our larger project: Videogame Stage Remaker. We are remaking a stage from different retro games with Unreal Engine!

We do not own the rights to Ninja Gaiden, this is just a fan remake of the first stage  from Ninja Gaiden 1 made for educational purposes. You can download it for free.

Next one is Sunset Riders! follow our SN and stay tunned for our upcoming remakes!!
